column2: Force this individual to relinquish a claim to one of your titles.
Refute Claim
Refute Claim
You can only ask someone to abandon a claim once per year.
Despite your fair request, [From.GetTitledName] has refused to abandon [From.GetHerHis] claim on your title.
Perhaps my efforts are better placed elsewhere...
[From.GetSheHeCap] just needs time to see reason.
Your plot to refute a claim succeeded.
I have no choice but to accept your demands and relinquish my claim.
Great.
Fine.
I have evidence refuting your claim to one of my titles. It would be in your best interests to relinquish it.
I think not.
They refused!
I will do as you wish
Send a letter with the evidence refuting the target's claim.
Refute Claim
You really should give up on this claim!
The refute claim plot has so far failed, but some wish to see it through.
My support will continue.  It's only right!
Best not be involved with this any further.
Supported revealed plot
Partook in a failed plot
Your Familiar is dead and the whole world looks black to you.
Maybe I should follow him into Aetherius?
The familiar of your plot target has been attacked, maybe even killed!
Well then, remind him that those things can happen...
Send him another letter with the request to abandon his claim!
Yeah, it was pestering me anyway.
Your familiar dies!
Your familiar survives!
Your familiar dies!
No. Breath. Live!

As you walk through the yard in the morning a horrible sight awaits you! Your loyal familiar lies in a puddle of blood, a piece of paper beside his body. "These things can happen to ambitious people!"
Well maybe some more pressure would make him overthink this.
during a prison escape attempt
Escape Prison
You want to escape Prison! In order to do so you will try to find helpful Items and then wait for an Opportunity to Escape!
Make an Escape Attempt!
Look for Opportunities to escape your prison cell
Failed Escape
You failed on your Escape try, you got lightly wounded and the Guards do have an additional eye on you.
Fled from Prison!
You made your Way successfully out of prison!
Finally Freedom!
Prisoner fought his Way out!
Your Prisoner [From.GetName] has killed several Guards and made his way out of Prison!
I will kill some more Guards if this does happen again!
Dungeon Revolt
There has been a revolt in your Dungeons, staked by [From.GetName]. [From.GetSheHe] did flee and other Prisoners are on their way out as well!
Stop them!
Escape Tunnel found!
Your Guards have found a Escape Tunnel in [From.GetName]'s Cell. [From.GetSheHe] was nowhere to be found...
Plug the Hole!
Prisoner disappeared
[From.GetName] has disappeared from [From.GetHerHis] Quarters and your Guards were unable to find any traces of [From.GetHerHim]
Continue the search until you drop dead
Prisoner feigned dead
Your spymaster informs you that [From.GetName] who has been thought dead by your guards and [From.GetHerHis] body been disposed is in fact not as dead as everybody thought.
You cant even distinguish between the Dead and the Living?
I will wait for another Opportunity
Maybe its better to not try to escape now. More preparation could not hurt.
